Title: COVID-19 Consent Form
ErrorSMSNotEnabled: SMS option is not enabled in your account

SeeMore.Title: See behind the scenes
SeeMore.Text:
This sample features:

  • SMS delivery
  • Templates
  • Data entry tabs
  • Anchor positioning

Code flow:

Step 1
When the button is selected, we ask the user to provide a name, email address, and phone number for the patient. The information will be used to fill in a placeholder recipient that is in the template. We then call the Templates:list method on the account to check if a template exists. If it does, we find the templateId; if not, we call the Templates:create method to create a new template with the required fields, documents, and a single placeholder recipient.

Step 2
We proceed to create an envelope from the template by using the Envelopes:create method, using the provided email address and name for the recipient. We then use the phone number provided to add an additional SMS notification for envelope delivery. The envelope is created and immediately sent out for remote signing by the single recipient. The recipient receives an email and a text message that includes a link to sign the COVID-19 consent form.
